Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
FROM SEGUROS.SI_RESSARC_PARCELA
 
WHERE     NUM_APOL_SINISTRO            = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO
AND           NUM_RESSARC                       = :NUM_RESSARC
AND           NUM_PARCELA                        = :NUM_PARCELA
AND           COD_OPERACAO                     =   4000
/
 END SQL
